file.name: openapi-schema.yml
file.content:
---
openapi: 3.0.3
info:
  title: Villain API
  description: This API allows CRUD operations on a villain
  contact:
    name: Quarkus
    url: https://github.com/quarkusio
  version: "1.0"
servers:
- url: http://localhost:8084
tags:
- name: hello
- name: villains
paths:
  /api/villains:
    get:
      tags:
      - villains
      summary: Returns all the villains from the database
      responses:
        "200":
          description: Gets all villains
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  $ref: '#/components/schemas/Villain'
    post:
      tags:
      - villains
      summary: Creates a valid villain
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/Villain'
      responses:
        "201":
          description: The URI of the created villain
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                format: uri
                type: string
        "400":
          description: Invalid villain passed in (or no request body found)
    delete:
      tags:
      - villains
      summary: Delete all villains
      responses:
        "204":
          description: Deletes all villains
  /api/villains/hello:
    get:
      tags:
      - hello
      summary: Ping hello
      responses:
        "200":
          description: Ping hello
          content:
            text/plain:
              schema:
                type: string
  /api/villains/random:
    get:
      tags:
      - villains
      summary: Returns a random villain
      responses:
        "200":
          description: Gets random villain
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Villain'
        "404":
          description: No villain found
  /api/villains/{id}:
    get:
      tags:
      - villains
      summary: Returns a villain for a given identifier
      parameters:
      - name: id
        in: path
        required: true
        schema:
          format: int64
          type: integer
      responses:
        "200":
          description: Gets a villain for a given id
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Villain'
        "404":
          description: The villain is not found for a given identifier
    put:
      tags:
      - villains
      summary: Completely updates/replaces an exiting villain by replacing it with
        the passed-in villain
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/Villain'
      responses:
        "204":
          description: Replaced the villain
        "400":
          description: Invalid villain passed in (or no request body found)
        "404":
          description: No villain found
    delete:
      tags:
      - villains
      summary: Deletes an exiting villain
      parameters:
      - name: id
        in: path
        required: true
        schema:
          format: int64
          type: integer
      responses:
        "204":
          description: Delete a villain
    patch:
      tags:
      - villains
      summary: Partially updates an exiting villain
      parameters:
      - name: id
        in: path
        required: true
        schema:
          format: int64
          type: integer
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/Villain'
      responses:
        "200":
          description: Updated the villain
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Villain'
        "400":
          description: Null villain passed in (or no request body found)
        "404":
          description: No villain found
components:
  schemas:
    Villain:
      required:
      - name
      - level
      type: object
      properties:
        id:
          format: int64
          type: integer
        name:
          maxLength: 50
          minLength: 3
          type: string
          nullable: false
        otherName:
          type: string
        level:
          format: int32
          minimum: 1
          type: integer
          nullable: false
        picture:
          type: string
        powers:
          type: string

Error: parse: paths: /api/villains/{id}: put: operation "": parse path: path parameter not specified: "id"
